Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. With its cutting-edge features and unparalleled performance, this product is truly a game-changer in its field. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, we believe it's worth more than $8000. Considering the value it offers, I'm extending an exclusive offer to you at a special price of $12000. This is your opportunity to secure a high-quality product at a competitive rate. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
